guidecheckbox_copy.jcr:title: Caltrans' Response to DRB/DRA Recommendation (see note) *

guidetextbox_1269931.jcr:title: If rejected, please list specific reasons for the rejection: *
guidetextbox_1269931.name: ReqRejComPPRES

guidetextdraw_1984448175._value: Note: Rejection of the DRB's decision requires approval of the Division of Construction's field coordinator. Acceptance of an unfavorable DRB recommendation requires approval in conformance with the change order approval authority table .
guidetextdraw_1984448175.name: textdraw_19844481751680677134921

guidefileupload_1939.jcr:title: File Attachment
guidefileupload_1939.name: ReqRecAttachPPRES

fd:scripts.fd:valueCommit: [{"script":{"content":"var docs=[];\\nguideBridge.getFileAttachmentsInfo({\\n success:function(list) {\\n for(var i=0; i<list.length;i++){\\n if(list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\").length>2){\\n var splitString = list[i].path.toString().split(\\".pdf\\");\\n var splitStringNeeded = splitString[0].split(\\"/\\"\,5);\\n var splitStringFinal = splitStringNeeded.join('/');\\n var finalString = splitString.join(\\".pdf\,\\"+splitStringFinal+\\"/\\").split(\\"\,\\");\\n var lastEle = finalString.pop();\\n for(var path in finalString){\\n //console.log(path);\\n if(finalString[path].includes(\\"ReqRecAttachPPRES\\")){\\n \\tdocs.push(finalString[path].replace(/\\\\n/g\,''));\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n else{\\n if(list[i].path.includes(\\"ReqRecAttachPPRES\\")){\\n docs.push(list[i].path);\\n }\\n }\\n }\\n FilePathsPPRES.value = docs;\\n }\\n});"\,"event":"Value Commit"\,"field":"guide.guideRootPanel-re.RecommendationPanelPPRES.ReqResPanelPPRES.ReqRecAttachPPRES"}\,"nodeName":"SCRIPTMODEL"\,"version":1\,"enabled":true}]
